Brief

NBA LIVE Mobile is a dynamic mobile basketball game that offers players the authentic NBA experience packaged for your smartphone. It engages players in a variety of game modes where they can build their dream team composed of NBA superstars and legends. As you partake in different challenges, you hone your skills and unlock new opportunities to dominate the hardwood.
